Writer: Phil Hay, Matt Manfredi, Peter Chung (characters)
Title: Æon Flux
Actors: Charlize Theron, Marton Csokas, Jonny Lee Miller, Sophie Okonedo
Plot: Aeon Flux is a mysterious assassin working for the Monicans, a group of rebels trying to overthrow the government. When she is sent on a mission to kill the Chairman, a whole new mystery is found.
